Easter Grazing Platter

Prep time
10 minutes
Difficulty
Easy

Looking for the ultimate Easter inspired grazing board for the platter pinchers in your life? We have pulled together your shopping list and all you have to do is arrange this visual feast with your delicious Easter favourites. Easter made by you, loved by all.

Ingredients

  • Hot cross buns
  • Chocolate eggs
  • Chocolate bunnies
  • Dark chocolate pieces
  • Strawberries
  • Figs
  • Blueberries
  • Grapes
  • Kiwis
  • Mix of different nuts
  • Variety of crackers
  • Beetroot dip (or your favourite variety)
  • Variety of cheeses – tip: invest in a bunny shaped cookie cutter and make some cheddar bunnies
  • Selection of cold meats - prosciutto, salami, ham
  • Sliced veggies – carrots, cucumbers, cherry tomatoes and radishes
 

 

The Nut Bar
Cedar Bakery
Lucia’s Euro Deli
Bakers Delight
San Andres Fruit and Vegetables
Ferguson Plarre's Bakehouse
Sweetbox
Method
1
Arrange all your delicious Easter favourites on a wooden platter (approx. 40cm in diameter).
 
2

To dress the table, add a bowl of mixed Mediterranean olives, colourful Easter eggs and lovely toasted ciabatta bread; brushed with olive oil and garlic.  

Notes


 
Occasion
Dinner
Lunch
